snippet.title: Star-Crossed Myth for Nintendo Switch™ - Promotional Reel
snippet.description:
The opening movie for the Nintendo Switch™ download-only games
"Star-Crossed Myth - The Department of Wishes -" and 
"Star-Crossed Myth - The Department of Punishments -"

◆Official Site◆
https://products.voltage.co.jp/switch/english/

◆Story◆
Your days are dreamless and mundane until, one night, you notice a star sparkling in the heavens. Suddenly, the beautiful gods of the stars appear before you. Their goal? To erase their sins.

This exquisite, heartrending true love…all began with a sin.
